title: Hermetical physick: or, The right way to preserve, and to restore health. By that famous and faithfull chymist, Henry Nollius. Englished by Henry Uaughan, Gent.
author: Nolle, Heinrich, fl. 1612-1619.
publisher: Printed by Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Princes Armes in St. Pauls Church-Yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
